attributes.action: Save The Ranch Adventure Playground and the Youth Centre
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, recognise that the Ranch and the Youth Centre have contributed for generations to the health and well being of children and their families.

Everyone who has lived in Southmead in Bristol, will know The Adventure playground, AKA The Ranch, and also the Youth Centre.
These much needed facilities are under threat of being put to tender for the highest bid, or closure by Bristol City Council on another of their bids to save money :O(
 Unfortunately, if these buildings close, the young people and the kiddies of Southmead will have nothing else, we need to keep these places open?
This is a plea to all the families in Southmead, and all the ex Southmeaders, please sign this petition in order to help keep your facilities open?

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council.
